meanings.definition: The quality or state of being nonsensical.
meanings.sent1: Her nonsensicalness in the meeting confused everyone.
meanings.sent2: The nonsensicalness of the joke made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent3: The nonsensicalness of the situation was like a puzzle with missing pieces.
meanings.sent4: His argument was full of nonsensicalness, like a broken record.
meanings.sent5: The nonsensicalness of the story was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: The act or instance of being nonsensical.
meanings.sent1: The nonsensicalness of his decision surprised us all.
meanings.sent2: We couldn't help but laugh at the nonsensicalness of the situation.
meanings.sent3: The nonsensicalness of the play had the audience in stitches.
meanings.sent4: Her nonsensicalness in the debate was like a comedy show.
meanings.sent5: The nonsensicalness of his actions left us speechless.
